document.discussion_title: Star Wars Group 501st Helps Dachshund Rescue in Texas - AtThaMovies
document.topic_text: Chris McCarron Breaking News By Lucas Siegel The 501st is a fan-run Star Wars group of cosplayers and philanthropists who dress as the villains of the Star Wars universe. However, while they’re portraying stormtroopers and Sith Lords, the group is known for their charity work.Recently, a detachment from Texas teamed up with Diamond Dachschund Rescue of Texas for a photo shoot and it is dark side adorable.The … …read more
document.post: Chris McCarron Breaking News By Lucas Siegel The 501st is a fan-run Star Wars group of cosplayers and philanthropists who dress as the villains of the Star Wars universe. However, while they’re portraying stormtroopers and Sith Lords, the group is known for their charity work.Recently, a detachment from Texas teamed up with Diamond Dachschund Rescue of Texas for a photo shoot and it is dark side adorable.The … …read more
